name: Pop Master
description:
A simple balloon popping game for kids, with colorful graphics, toys, candies, flowers, stars, cute animals and many more to play with. A variety of cool background themes that your kids love. 

A unique right match identifying game besides the fun of popping balloons.

Features:
* 7 different matching packs to choose from. ( Alphabets, Numbers, Flowers, Stars, Animals, Fruits & Christmas Items )
* 9 different cool background themes ( Bright Day, Autumn, SunSet, MoonLight, Rainy Day, Sunny Desert, Candy Land, Christmas, Halloween )
* 9 different toon music tracks w.r.t themes.
* 20 challenges to unlock Achievements

A complete fun filled stunning visual match learning game designed with care and love for kids.

An absolute free game with only choice based ads and no IAPs :)

Why Late ? Grab your copy today.
